Moderation module¶

class mod.Moderation(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: discord.ext.commands.cog.Cog

Main moderation cog. This handles all mod commands including kicks, bans, mutes, warns, and cases.

ban(ctx, victim, reason=None)¶

Bans victim from the server with the audit-log reason as REASON or a default message if reason==None

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim to ban

reason (str) - Reason of ban

case(ctx, num)¶

Retrives a case from its number

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

num (int) - The integer ID to retrieve

clear(ctx, num, member=None)¶

Clear a number of messages, optionally from member

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

num (int) - The number of messages to clear

member (discord.User) - Optionally only clear messages by this member

clearlogs(ctx, member, reason=None)¶

Clears the logs of member

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

member (discord.User) - The member to clear logs of

reason (str) - Reason

clearserver(ctx)¶

Clears all infractions in the server

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

infractions(ctx, victim)¶

Retrieves all infractions by victim and pretty-print the output

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim to retrieve infractions from

kick(ctx, victim, reason=None)¶

Kicks victim from the server with the audit-log reason as REASON or a default message if reason==None

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim to kick

reason (str) - Reason of kick

mute(ctx, victim, d='10', reason=None)¶

Mutes member for D time

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim

d (str) - A number followed by a letter (if none, assume minute)

reason (str) - Reason

mutes(ctx)¶

Gets all active mutes

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

mywarns(ctx)¶

Gets warns of author

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

removecase(ctx, case, reason)¶

Removes case

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

case (int) - Case to remove

reason (str) - Reason

rr(ctx, a)¶

Filler command to allow reaction role bot to run concurrently

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

a (str) - Catch all args

serverwarns(ctx)¶

Gets all warns in server, sorted by most warns to least

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

softban(ctx, victim, reason=None)¶

Softbans victim to remove all messages

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim

reason (str) - Reason

tempban(ctx, victim, duration, reason=None)¶

DEPRECATED - Temporarily bans victim for duration

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

duration (str) - Duration Reason (str) - Reason

unban(ctx, victim, reason=None)¶

Unbans victim

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim

reason (str) - Reason

unmute(ctx, victim, reason=None)¶

Unmutes victim

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim

reason (str) - Reason

warn(ctx, victim, reason)¶

Warns victim ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim

reason (str) - Reason

mod.canban(ctx, member: discord.member.Member)¶

Can member ban in CTX :returns: Can ban? :rtype: bool

mod.candelete(ctx, member: discord.member.Member)¶

Can member delete messages in CTX :returns: Can delete? :rtype: bool

mod.cankick(ctx, member: discord.member.Member)¶

Can member kick in CTX :returns: Can kick? :rtype: bool

mod.formatter(inf: dict)¶
Returns

Formatted string

Return type

str

mod.proctime(d)¶

Convers D to an integer in seconds :param d: Duration :type d: str

Returns

Time in seconds of duration

Return type

int

mod.setup(bot: bot.DarkBot)¶

Setup the cog
